subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|mythology}} a [[legendary]] [[animal]] [[resembling]] a [[raccoon dog]] and with [[eye]]s like those of [[human being]]s (from the ''{{w|Classic of Mountains and Seas}}'' or ''Shan Hai Jing'')
